episodes.title: Dating After a Cult: Stop Mistaking Pain For Love
episodes.description:
In this video, we unpack how one can tackle dating  after leaving a high control religion with new belief systems, higher standards and on your own terms. Healing means losing people you once prayed for, a painful but necessary step in the journey of recovery from religious trauma and abuse. As an ExJW, I've learned that faith deconstruction and healing after abuse requires letting go of toxic relationships that once held you back.

episodes.title: The TRUTH About African Spirituality
episodes.description:
Join me on this journey of spiritual growth and collective liberation as I embrace my African spirituality, often misconceived as witchcraft. As an Exjw, I'm committed to unlearning and decolonizing the old paradigm, and instead, reclaiming and celebrating my black identity and cultural heritage. This decolonization journey is not just about me, but about our collective healing and the new paradigm we're creating. Let's dive into the world of African spirituality, free from the constraints of colonized religion, and explore the beauty of our ancestral traditions.


CHATERS
Intro 00:00 -  01:31
Misconceptions 01:31 - 02:29
Ubuntu 02:30 - 06:08
African Spirituality 06:09 - 09:07
African Spirituality teachings 09:09 - 11:52
Where African Spirituality and Ubuntu meet 11:53 - 13:58
Conclusion 13:59 - End

#exjw #ubuntu #reclaimingafricanspirituality #exjwjourney #exjwsupport #ancestralwisdom #monicaraseroka #africanmythology #ancestralconnection #identifyreclamation #spiritualawakening #decolonizationjourney #decolonizingreligion

episodes.title: Best Ex-JW Books & Videos You NEED to See
episodes.description:
Are you a former Jehovah's Witness looking for resources to help you transition out of the organization? Or are you simply curious about the experiences of ex-JWs? In this video, we'll be listing the best books and videos you need to see to learn more about the Jehovah's Witness faith and the lives of those who have left it behind. From memoirs to documentaries, we'll be covering it all. Whether you're looking for personal stories, educational resources, or simply a deeper understanding of this complex and often misunderstood religion, this video has got you covered. So sit back, relax, and let's dive into the best ExJW books and videos you need to see!

Links to videos:
Cults, Explained - https://youtu.be/6NWIfiV1_XQ?si=coR_41LVe_Su_z6F

To read up more on the history of African American and their Jehovah's Witnesses experience, read this excellent paper by Markus Issac Hicks - : Psychological Warfare: Jehovah’s Witnesses and The African American Experience

episodes.title: Why I left the Jehovah's Witnesses - My Story
episodes.description:
Hey there

This has been in the making for a long time, and I finally feel ready to share my story. I have not formally left, I am categorized as an inactive witness, so I guess this is me coming out! 

I'm a bit awkward in the beginning, but I open up as the video goes along. I keep using the words religion, church, and organisation interchangeably throughout this video. I hope it's not too confusing for those that don't know much about this organisation. 

Linked below are a few resources to explore. 

Please feel free to leave questions or any other related content you would like me to cover, maybe I'll create a part 2 about how I left in more detail and how the elders came to visit me twice after I stopped attending.

Resources:
Escaping Jehovah's Witnesses: Inside the dangerous world of a brutal religion ://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gDwHdj7plWo&t=1155s

Australian Royal Commission playlist -  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W9q2ImaE_lg&list=PLtizNalcHHE-nfRihJfOCI-_kA4Pis_JK&ab_channel=JakkeControl

Malawi & Mexico Oath of Allegiance  - https://www.jwfacts.com/verdadtj/atalaya/malaui-mexico-juramento-lealtad.php

Changed teachings - https://www.jwfacts.com/watchtower/changed-watchtower-teachings.php

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Music: 
Jeff Kaale - Secret Sauce


Thank you for watching!

#JW #Jehovah'sWitnesses #Cult
